alert.note: Alert for Harris; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Troup and northwestern Harris Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Jones Crossroads, or near Lanett, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, West Point, Pine Mountain, Cannonville, State Line Park, Abbottsford, Piedmont Heights, Mountain Hill, Jones Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad, Whitesville-Pine Lake, Lake Harding and Long Cane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
